About Automobile Engineering

Introduction
Automobile engineering is a specialized field of study focused on the design, manufacturing, maintenance, and innovation of automotive systems. Automobile engineering is a multidisciplinary field that combines mechanical, electrical, and electronic engineering principles to develop, improve, and maintain vehicles. It plays a crucial role in advancing transportation technology and sustainability. Its specialties include: Vehicle Design, Engine Technology, Vehicle Dynamics, Automotive Electronics, Materials and Manufacturing, Sustainability and Environmental Impact, Safety Engineering, Autonomous Vehicles, Motorsport Engineering.
Program Educational Objectives (PEOs):
Students should develop sound fundamental knowledge in mathematics, science and automobile engineering.
Students would acquire an ability to function productively as an individual as well as in a team and are well versed in using modern technology and equipment to solve real world problems.
Students would be provided with opportunities to develop an instinct for innovation and skills as researchers through industry collaboration, practical training, laboratory experience, projects and the various courses offered to them.
Students would inculcate a professional and ethical attitude, good leadership qualities and commitment to social responsibilities in their thought process.
Students will be encouraged to understand the importance of lifelong learning, working on contemporary global issues and to become a successful entrepreneur.
Program Specific Outcomes
Student should be able to generate and develop ideas that can result in self employment (eg. Start–ups) and create more jobs.
Students should be updated with the latest trends in automobile engineering, beyond curriculum by way of doing internships and research projects
Automobile Engineering
Definition and Scope:
PCE’s Automobile Engineering program stands out as one of the best in Navi Mumbai, offering a comprehensive and industry-aligned curriculum designed to shape the automotive engineers of tomorrow. The course equips students with cutting-edge knowledge in vehicle design, manufacturing, and testing, blending theoretical principles with hands-on experience in state-of-the-art laboratories. With a focus on innovation, students are trained in advanced areas such as electric and hybrid vehicles, alternative fuels, and automotive safety systems, ensuring they stay ahead in this dynamic field. Pillai’s strong industry connections provide students with opportunities for internships, workshops, and live projects, offering practical exposure to real-world challenges. By fostering creativity and technical expertise, it prepares graduates to excel in leading automotive companies and make significant contributions to the future of mobility.
Vision:
To develop an established institution of Automobile Engineering which will become a centre of quality standardization, research and academics through innovation, high quality teaching, projects and world class technology.
Mission:
To provide quality education and knowledge that is well-grounded in the fundamental principles of engineering, which fosters innovation, and prepares students for leadership positions and successful careers in industry, academia or entrepreneurial ventures.
Programs Offered at Pillai College of Engineering
Bachelor of Automobile Engineering Course Structure:
The curriculum of the Automobile Engineering program focuses on core automotive concepts, vehicle dynamics, thermodynamics, and engine systems, along with emerging technologies like Electric Vehicles, Autonomous Systems, and Additive Manufacturing. Students will engage in hands-on projects and labs to develop skills in designing, analyzing, and optimizing automotive systems. The program prepares students for diverse career paths in automobile design, manufacturing, motorsports engineering, and emerging fields like electric and autonomous vehicles. This comprehensive approach equips students for roles in both traditional and cutting-edge automotive industries.

Admission Process
Admission Requirements:
Students willing to pursue a Bachelor of Technology in Top 10 Electronic and Computer Science Engineering  Colleges in Navi Mumbai, need to meet the following qualifications:
Eligibility
: The Candidate must have completed their 12th-grade education with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics as core subjects. A minimum percentage in these subjects is required, as specified by the admission authority.
Entrance Exams
: The candidate must have a valid score in either
MHT-CET
(Maharashtra Common Entrance Test) or
JEE
(Joint Entrance Examination). These exams determine merit-based admissions into the engineering program.
Application Process
: Students can apply online through the Centralized Admission Process
(CAP)
, which is handled by the Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Maharashtra. After clearing the entrance exam, candidates can select
Pillai College of Engineering
as their preferred choice during the CAP counseling process.
Cutoff:
Electronics & Computer Science 2024-25 at Pillai College was
85.342
percentile.

The
documents
necessary to complete the admission process include the following:

Note:
For the previously mentioned documents, all students have to hand in two (2) sets of attested photocopies.
Since the original documents will only be given back to the students upon course completion, it is recommended that all students keep a suitable quantity of attested photocopies of all the documents they provided to the institution upon enrollment.
Before presenting their documents to the college for admission, all students must scan them. In order to submit these scanned documents for scholarships, etc., they must be uploaded.
Application Timeline:
The admission process for Automobile Engineering at Pillai College of Engineering typically follows the MHT-CET and JEE Main merit system. Here are the tentative general key application milestones:
MHT-CET Registration
: Generally opens in early January.
MHT-CET Exam Date
: Usually held in May.
CAP Rounds
: Commence after the exam results, typically in June-July.
Admission Deadlines
: Vary based on the schedules for CAP rounds and JEE Main results.
Note
:
It is essential for prospective students to stay updated on application openings, CAP round deadlines, and document verification periods each year.
Meeting the eligibility criteria will help ensure a smooth admission process.
To stay informed about specific dates, students should regularly check the official MHT-CET website.
By keeping track of these important dates and requirements, students can effectively navigate their journey to admission at Pillai College of Engineering.

Exam Preparation Resources:
Automobile
Engineering Syllabus in IIT Bombay:
Textbooks:
Focus on NCERT textbooks for Physics, Mathematics, and Chemistry, as they cover fundamental concepts essential for both MHT-CET and JEE Main.
Reference Books:
Physics: “Concepts of Physics” by H.C. Verma
Mathematics: “Objective Mathematics” by R.D. Sharma
Chemistry: “Organic Chemistry” by Morrison and Boyd
Online Resources:
Websites like Khan Academy, BYJU’S, and Unacademy offer video lectures and practice problems tailored for these entrance exams.
Previous Year Papers:
Solve previous years’ question papers for MHT-CET and JEE Main to understand the exam pattern and frequently asked questions.
Mock Tests:
Regularly take mock tests to build exam temperament and time management skills for securing a seat at the best Computer Science Engineering Colleges in Maharashtra.
Note:
For practicing you can visit:
mockcet.mes.ac.in
Training and Development Opportunities
Internships and Industry Collaboration:
Pillai College of Engineering (PCE) stands out as a premier institution for its exceptional placement opportunities, particularly for the Automobile Engineering course. With strong affiliations to leading companies and industries, the program ensures students gain access to promising career pathways in the dynamic automotive sector. By blending in-depth theoretical knowledge with practical skills, PCE prepares students to excel in real-world automotive challenges. The dedicated placement cell actively connects students with top-tier employers and facilitates diverse internship opportunities, making PCE, a top choice for aspiring automobile engineers.
Some of these leading companies in collaboration with our college, who provide internships to our students are mentioned below:
Our Industry Collaboration
Best Automobile Engineering Training Institutes in Navi Mumbai Region:
Skill Enhancement programs facilitated by PCE:
IIT Bombay Remote Center:
Our College is a Remote center for IIT Bombay with a rating of 4 stars. It helps to keep in touch with the contemporary technical skills of students and teaching skills of faculty colleagues in core Engineering and Science subjects both physically and virtually.
Value-added courses:
Institute conducts various value-added courses
to enhance the teaching and learning experience making our college one of the best automobile engineering institutes in Panvel & Navi Mumbai.

Student Clubs:
ISHRAE PCE:
ISHRAE stands for Indian Society of Heating Ventilation and Air Conditioning Engineers. It is a subchapter which comes under ISHRAE Thane Chapter controlled by ISHRAE West Zone. ISHRAE PCE Conducts Industrial Visits, Seminars, Webinars, K-12, Anubhav, Job Fair, Opportunities in Internship and Job for HVAC Department, etc
ISHRAE-PCE
Racing Teams:
HYPERION RACING:
Hyperion Racing is a team of dedicated students who design and manufacture racing cars in order to participate in Formula Student events around the world. The students use the knowledge acquired in the classroom to innovate while staying within the restrictions of the competitions. The team comprises students from all streams of engineering which allows the diverse thoughts and ideas. The team was started back in 2013.
HYPERION RACING:
Spark Racing Team is a Formula Student electric type race car team,     based in Navi Mumbai. We are a team of young students who aspire to create a mark in massive competitions like Formula Imperial and Formula Bharat!  The team independently designs, manufactures and tests Automotive vehicles which then compete at National and International level competition.
VANGUARD RACING:
The Vanguard Racing Team is a part of Pillai College of Engineering located in New Panvel, Navi-Mumbai. This team is made up of undergraduate engineering students from many fields that are excited about growing, developing, and planning to increase their knowledge and soft skills. We design, build, and manufacture an All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) that competes in a variety of competitions.
Career Prospects for Graduates
Job Opportunities After Graduation
A degree in Automobile Engineering paves the way for careers in design, manufacturing, testing, and advanced automotive technologies. Graduates from prestigious colleges in Navi Mumbai are equipped with a competitive edge, unlocking global opportunities in the ever-evolving automotive industry.
Automobile Design Engineer
Innovates car designs and components.
Vehicle Dynamics Engineer
Optimizes vehicle stability and control.
Production Engineer
Oversees manufacturing processes and operations.
Manufacturing Engineer
Enhances production efficiency and workflows.
Quality Control Engineer
Ensures product quality and compliance.
Research and Development Engineer
Creates new automotive technologies.
Electric Vehicle Engineer
Develops electric and hybrid vehicles.
Motorsports Engineer
Designs high-performance racing vehicles.
Autonomous Vehicle Engineer
Advances self-driving vehicle technology.
Automotive Testing Engineer
Validates vehicle systems and performance.
After completing Bachelor of Automobile Engineering at our College in Navi Mumbai, our alumni are well trained and become industry ready in totality.

Alumni Success Stories
Viraj Shetty
CEO (Prevalent Automotive)
After Engineering degree in Automobile domain, Viraj gained extensive experience at Ashok Leyland, Volvo Cars, and Tata. Then established a start-up Prevalent Automotive PVT LTD in EV domain. With a focus on pioneering growth and development in the electric vehicle sector, taking on the challenges of manufacturing and leadership in the automotive industry.
Shridhar Sahu
Project Research Engineer at ARAI
Shridhar Sahu
is an alumnus of Pillai College of Engineering with a degree in Automobile Engineering. Transitioned seamlessly into advanced automotive research at the Automotive Research Association of India (ARAI). Current work focuses on developing thermal solutions for electric vehicles, alongside designing portable EVs and IoT-based data acquisition systems for enhanced connectivity and performance monitoring.
Atul Zanjurne
Cofounder & CTO at TÜSK
After completing UG in Automobile engineering from PCE Atul completed 4 years journey at
Calamus as
Head of Research And Development (Engineering). With this valuable experience he started a new journey with TUSK. With a simple purpose  to create an effective range of oral care products that you love using, every day.
Ashwin Kutty
Project Engineer at Toyo Engineering India Limited
Successfully completing UG in automobile engineering with multiple certifications from PCE. Ashwin got an opportunity to complete his masters in Industrial Engineering. Now he is serving as
Project Engineer at Toyo Engineering India Limited
Why Choose Pillai College of Engineering for Automobile Engineering
Best Computer Science Navi Mumbai University:
Quality of Education at PCE :
Pillai College of Engineering stands as a distinguished institution for automobile engineering in Navi Mumbai, offering a curriculum that seamlessly combines theoretical rigor with industry-relevant training. Emphasizing practical application and real-world projects, the program equips students with comprehensive expertise to excel in the evolving automotive sector.
Pillai College of Engineering stands out as one of the best colleges for B Tech in Automobile Engineering due to its rigorous accreditation, which ensures that our programs adhere to high educational standards and deliver a curriculum that is comprehensive. Being approved by top institutional bodies, ensures that our programs meet national benchmarks and guarantees a quality learning experience, enhancing our graduates’ employability and credibility in the professional world, thus making our college one of the top colleges in Navi Mumbai.

Frequently Asked Questions
What is the eligibility criteria for enrolling in Automobile Engineering at Pillai College of Engineering?
The students applying for any engineering course in PCE must have a 10+2 i.e to have completed 12th education with subjects Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics as their core subjects. They must also score a valid score in the entrance exams MHT CET or JEE. Admission is based on merit through a transparent process, with specific cutoff scores varying annually.
What career opportunities are available after completing an Automobile Engineering course?
Graduates of Automobile Engineering have diverse career opportunities across various domains. They can work as design engineers, production engineers, quality control specialists, or research and development experts in automotive manufacturing companies. Roles in emerging fields like electric vehicles, autonomous vehicles, and alternative energy systems are in high demand. Additionally, opportunities exist in motorsport engineering, supply chain management, and vehicle testing. Graduates may also explore careers in academia, entrepreneurship, or pursue higher studies in specialized areas of automotive technology.
What is the admission process for automobile engineering courses at Pillai College?
The students who wish to apply for Automobile Engineering programs must meet the eligibility criteria for admission. The application process involves submitting the online form with the required documents and paying the application fee. For further information, check the admission page on the website.
Are there any automobile courses available for students after completing the 10th standard?
No,The students applying for any engineering course in PCE must have a 10+2 i.e to have completed 12th education with subjects Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics as their core subjects.
What programs are available for Automobile Engineering at Pillai College of Engineering?
Pillai College of Engineering offers a 4-year full-time B.Tech in Automobile Engineering with a curriculum covering Electric Vehicles, Additive Manufacturing, Motorsports, Autonomous Vehicles, Transportation, Supply Chain Management, and Automotive Designing. Students can also choose from Institute-level specializations such as Business and Entrepreneurship, Bioengineering, Engineering Design, Art and Humanities, Applied Science, and Life Skills, Repair, Maintenance, and Safety.
What are the key deadlines for the application process?
For detailed information about application deadlines and the admission process for the Automobile Engineering program at Pillai College of Engineering, please visit the admission page.
What entrance exams are required for admission to Electrical and Computer Engineering?
There are two entrance exams that are accepted including the Joint Entrance Examination(JEE) or the Maharashtra Health and Technical Common Entrance Test(MHT CET). A credible score in either of these exams is accepted.
What internship opportunities are available for students?
Students can gain practical experience through summer internships at leading tech companies, research institutions, and startups in areas like software development, hardware design, embedded systems, and IoT. The college’s dedicated Training and Placement Cell assists students in securing internships aligned with their interests and career goals.
Does Pillai College of Engineering offer job placement services?
Yes. Pillai College is affiliated with various reputed and recognized companies including L&T Infotech, GEP, Capgemini, Tata Consultancy Service, Ekeeda and Dyson.
